=== RUN   TestSimpleArchiveFactory
DEBUG 2020/05/05 16:00:14 binary.go:48: Adding build actions for go binary module 'test-bin'
DEBUG 2020/05/05 16:00:14 archive.go:43: Adding build actions for go binary module 'test-out'
    TestSimpleArchiveFactory: archive_test.go:51: Gennerated ninja build file:
        # ******************************************************************************
        # ***            This file is generated and should not be edited             ***
        # ******************************************************************************
        #
        # This file contains variables, rules, and pools with name prefixes indicating
        # they were generated by the following Go packages:
        #
        # archmodule [from Go package
        # github.com/Tornado9966/Lab2_Go/build/archmodule]
        #     binmodule  [from Go package github.com/Tornado9966/Lab2_Go/build/binmodule]
        #
        ninja_required_version = 1.7.0
        
        rule g.archmodule.ziparchive
            command = cd ${workDir}/cmd/archivate && go run archivate.go ${output} ${inputsZip}
            description = zip archive
        
        rule g.binmodule.binaryBuild
            command = cd ${workDir} && go build -o ${outputPath} ${pkg}
            description = build go command ${pkg}
        
        rule g.binmodule.gotest
            command = cd ${workDir} && go test -v ${pkgTest} > ${outputFile}
            description = test ${pkgTest}
        
        rule g.binmodule.vendor
            command = cd ${workDir} && go mod vendor
            description = vendor dependencies of ${name}
        
        # # # # # # # # # # # # # # # # # # # # # # # # # # # # # # # # # # # # # # # #
        # Module:  test-bin
        # Variant:
        # Type:    go_binary
        # Factory: github.com/Tornado9966/Lab2_Go/build/binmodule.SimpleBinFactory
        # Defined: Blueprints:2:4
        
        build vendor: g.binmodule.vendor | go.mod
            description = Vendor dependencies of test-bin
            name = test-bin
            workDir = .
        
        build out/bin/test-bin: g.binmodule.binaryBuild | test-src.go vendor
            description = Build test-bin as Go binary
            outputPath = out/bin/test-bin
            pkg = .
            workDir = .
        default out/bin/test-bin
        
        build out/bin: g.binmodule.gotest | test-src.go
            description = Test my module
            outputFile = out/bin
            pkgTest = 
            workDir = .
        default out/bin
        
        # # # # # # # # # # # # # # # # # # # # # # # # # # # # # # # # # # # # # # # #
        # Module:  test-out
        # Variant:
        # Type:    archive_bin
        # Factory: github.com/Tornado9966/Lab2_Go/build/archmodule.SimpleArchiveFactory
        # Defined: Blueprints:9:4
        
        build out/archives/test-out.zip: g.archmodule.ziparchive
            description = Archive zipped: test-out
            inputsZip = out/bin/test-bin 
            output = out/archives/test-out.zip
            workDir = .
        default out/archives/test-out.zip
        
--- PASS: TestSimpleArchiveFactory (0.00s)
PASS
ok  	github.com/Tornado9966/Lab2_Go/build/archmodule	0.009s
=== RUN   TestSimpleBinFactory
DEBUG 2020/05/05 16:00:14 binary.go:48: Adding build actions for go binary module 'test-out'
    TestSimpleBinFactory: binary_test.go:45: Gennerated ninja build file:
        # ******************************************************************************
        # ***            This file is generated and should not be edited             ***
        # ******************************************************************************
        #
        # This file contains variables, rules, and pools with name prefixes indicating
        # they were generated by the following Go packages:
        #
        #     binmodule [from Go package github.com/Tornado9966/Lab2_Go/build/binmodule]
        #
        ninja_required_version = 1.7.0
        
        rule g.binmodule.binaryBuild
            command = cd ${workDir} && go build -o ${outputPath} ${pkg}
            description = build go command ${pkg}
        
        rule g.binmodule.gotest
            command = cd ${workDir} && go test -v ${pkgTest} > ${outputFile}
            description = test ${pkgTest}
        
        rule g.binmodule.vendor
            command = cd ${workDir} && go mod vendor
            description = vendor dependencies of ${name}
        
        # # # # # # # # # # # # # # # # # # # # # # # # # # # # # # # # # # # # # # # #
        # Module:  test-out
        # Variant:
        # Type:    go_binary
        # Factory: github.com/Tornado9966/Lab2_Go/build/binmodule.SimpleBinFactory
        # Defined: Blueprints:2:4
        
        build vendor: g.binmodule.vendor | go.mod
            description = Vendor dependencies of test-out
            name = test-out
            workDir = .
        
        build out/bin/test-out: g.binmodule.binaryBuild | test-src.go vendor
            description = Build test-out as Go binary
            outputPath = out/bin/test-out
            pkg = .
            workDir = .
        default out/bin/test-out
        
        build out/bin: g.binmodule.gotest | test-src.go
            description = Test my module
            outputFile = out/bin
            pkgTest = 
            workDir = .
        default out/bin
        
--- PASS: TestSimpleBinFactory (0.00s)
PASS
ok  	github.com/Tornado9966/Lab2_Go/build/binmodule	0.004s
?   	github.com/Tornado9966/Lab2_Go/build/cmd/archivate	[no test files]
?   	github.com/Tornado9966/Lab2_Go/build/cmd/bood	[no test files]
